definition.name: Labeler
definition.description: Automatically label new pull requests based on the paths of files being changed
definition.author: GitHub

inputs.name: repo-token
inputs.description: The GitHub token used to manage labels

inputs.name: configuration-path
inputs.description: The path for the label configurations

inputs.name: sync-labels
inputs.description: Whether or not to remove labels when matching files are reverted

inputs.name: dot
inputs.description: Whether or not to auto-include paths starting with dot (e.g. `.github`)

outputs.name: new-labels
outputs.description: A comma-separated list of all new labels

outputs.name: all-labels
outputs.description: A comma-separated list of all labels that the PR contains
